<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Delete by id
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/subscriber/{subscriber_id}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Delete the subscriber with a defined id.

## Request
